pages.text: When you expose a [#](bb00bb)Pastel Node[#]() to a [#](449900)redstone signal[#](), it loses its link to the connected inventory.

\- [Gather Nodes](entry://pastel_network/gather_node) will stop requesting items\- [Provider Nodes](entry://pastel_network/provider_node) are unable to offer their items\- [Sender Nodes](entry://pastel_network/sender_node) will stop emptying their inventory\- [Storage Nodes](entry://pastel_network/storage_node) will be unable to accept and offer their items
